item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: p_- noob. You can trade it in the bucket menu, but since the shopkeeper sells it, you are prohibited from placing it on the marketplace.

item.title: Not Tradeable.
item.content:encoded:
Here it says that you can trade the serum but you can't. what happens is that when you get to the marketplace it will show up in your list of things that you could possibly post for sale but then when you attempt to sell it you get this message:

-"The Shopkeeper pops in and stops you. "Whoa, there. I sell those. Chill out."

So no, its not tradeable. I haven't tested with anything else from the shop but i'd assume its the same way.

This should be changed on this site..
